proposedChanges.value: Simplify the hero section to focus on a single, powerful message with a clear CTA.
proposedChanges.rationale: A focused hero section enhances clarity and directs attention to the CTA.

proposedChanges.value: Increase the font size and weight of the headline for better focus and clarity.
proposedChanges.rationale: A dominant headline improves initial engagement and message retention.

proposedChanges.value: Position the hero CTA prominently above the fold on all devices.
proposedChanges.rationale: Immediate visibility of CTA increases the likelihood of conversion.

proposedChanges.value: Integrate customer testimonials and auditability features below the hero.
proposedChanges.rationale: Building trust early in the page flow reassures potential customers.

proposedChanges.value: Use a simplified grid layout for pricing to enhance scannability.
proposedChanges.rationale: A clear grid layout reduces cognitive load and aids quick decision-making.

proposedChanges.value: Highlight third-party certifications or industry endorsements near pricing.
proposedChanges.rationale: Third-party validation near pricing can boost trust and conversion.

proposedChanges.value: Reorder sections to place problem and solution immediately after hero.
proposedChanges.rationale: Logical flow from problem to solution aids understanding and engagement.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure sticky CTA is always visible on mobile without obstructing content.
proposedChanges.rationale: Persistent CTA on mobile encourages action while maintaining usability.

assumptions: Small business owners value clear pricing
